info.description:
# Docling for Nextcloud
Transform your documents with AI-powered processing! Docling brings advanced document understanding capabilities directly to your Nextcloud.
## Features
- **Multi-format Support**: Process PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, HTML, images, and more - **Smart Extraction**: Extract text, tables, formulas, and code from complex documents - **Multiple Output Formats**: Export to Markdown, HTML, JSON, or plain text - **OCR Support**: Extract text from scanned documents and images - **Batch Processing**: Process multiple documents at once - **Background Jobs**: Long-running conversions happen in the background
## How it Works
Docling runs as an External Application (ExApp) using Nextcloud's AppAPI. This means: - All processing happens securely within your Nextcloud infrastructure - No external services or API calls required - Your documents never leave your server
## Requirements
- Nextcloud 28 or higher - AppAPI app installed and configured with a Docker deploy daemon - Sufficient RAM for document processing (4GB+ recommended)
